excerpt: This vegan tomato soup is easy to make and the perfect comforting soup for chilly days.
instructions: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add the garlic and onion and saut√© until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the chopped tomatoes, carrot, vegetable broth, salt, and pepper.
Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
Use an immersion blender or transfer the soup to a blender and blend until smooth.
Serve hot with crusty bread or crackers.
